business

Class PDSCDocumentManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • business.PDSCDocumentManager

  • public class PDSCDocumentManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Functions to manage PDSCDocument objects NOTE : all functions in someNameManager classes change the instance of the object unlike SomeNameUtils classes
    Author:
    mircopalese

    • Method Detail

      • createPDSCFileFromJDomDocument

        public static Response createPDSCFileFromJDomDocument(java.lang.String path,
                                                      java.lang.String extension,
                                                      org.jdom2.Document doc,
                                                      boolean createOnTempFile,
                                                      boolean overrideIfExists)
        Create a NEW PDSC file on filesystem representing passed document.
        Parameters:
        path - path on wich create file
        extension - file's extension (usually pdsc)
        doc - JDom document object to transform into a file
        createOnTempFile - set to true if you want to create a temp file instead of a normal file on filesystem. Please note that enabling this option, @param path, @param extension and
        overrideIfExists - will be ignored.
        overrideIfExists - set to true to override document if during creation, document already exists.
        Returns:
        response object containing status of operation, message, and if creation was successful created file.

      • savePDSCDDocumentOnFileSystem

        public static Response savePDSCDDocumentOnFileSystem(java.lang.String path,
                                                     org.jdom2.Document doc)
        Save PDSC document on fileSystem NOTE : This function is the same as createPDSCFileFromJDomDocument, but with createOnTempFile = false and overrideIfExists = false.
        Parameters:
        path - path (with document name and extension of an already existing pdsc file)
        extension - file extension (usually PDSC)
        doc - JDMOM Document to save.
        Returns:
        response object containing status of operation, message, and if creation was successful created file.

      • createNewPDSCDocument

        public static PDSCDocument createNewPDSCDocument()
        Create new PDSCDocument and return created document;
        Returns:
        created PDSC document
